snippet.title: Wild Blue - Humble Games Showcase 2025 Trailer
snippet.description: Wild Blue reimagines the classic on-rail adventures of the '90s. Join Bowie Stray and the Blue Bombers as they soar through the skies on a mission to save the world in this action-packed, nostalgic journey! Watch the Wild Blue reveal teaser trailer for a peek at this upcoming adventure game and join Mark Lentz at Chuhai Labs to learn more. Wild Blue will be available on PC (Steam).
